about.title: About Us
about.summary: Jiuku is a leading entertainment technology company. dedicated to enhancing users' entertainment experiences through innovative products and services.
about.description:
Founded in 2014 and headquartered in Panyu, Guangzhou, the company adheres to a user-centered philosophy, constantly pursuing innovation. It focuses on the custom development of claw machines, providing high-quality interactive entertainment experiences for users worldwide.

Our products are characterized by exquisite design and intelligent technology, meeting the needs of various clients and offering users a completely new entertainment experience.

Jiuku also provides related equipment support services, helping partners achieve the digital transformation of smart entertainment devices, fostering rapid business growth.

Since its establishment, Jiuku has been continuously innovating and challenging itself, with the goal of becoming the global leader in custom claw machine solutions.
